data.eml:eml: New taeniogyrinid species of sea cucumber from the Weddell Sea (Echinodermata: Holothuroidea: Synaptida)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article O’Loughlin, P. Mark, Mackenzie, Melanie, Vandenspiegel, Didier, Griffiths, Huw (2015): New taeniogyrinid species of sea cucumber from the Weddell Sea (Echinodermata: Holothuroidea: Synaptida). Zootaxa 3995 (1): 271-283, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3995.1.23
